channel.title: MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered) - A free audiobook by Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
channel.description: In this podiobook: Tee Morris returns to the world's first podiobook, restoring lost scenes, adding in more production elements, and featuring guest voices from favorite podcasts. Set sail with Rafe and Askana again...for the first time.Morevi, a landlocked kingdom shrouded by jungles and mystery, falls under the rule of Askana Moldarin. In the dawn of this New Age, hidden traitors in her own regime threaten to destroy everything. The First Queen, independent of council, seeks help to reveal the conspiracy against her... Enter Rafe Rafton, captain of the Defiant.

image.title: MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered) - A free audiobook by Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)

In the dawn of this New Age, hidden traitors in her own regime threaten to destroy everything. The First Queen, independent of council, seeks help to reveal the conspiracy against her... channel.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)

item.title: Episode 1 - Prologue: A Leap of Faith - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Our adventure opens with the death of a captain and a band of privateers on the run and under fire. At the moment when all appears lost, the Ship's Navigator takes the helm.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: Our adventure opens with the death of a...
item.itunes:summary: Our adventure opens with the death of a captain and a band of privateers on the run and under fire. At the moment when all appears lost, the Ship's Navigator takes the helm.
item.itunes:keywords: MOREVITheChroniclesofRafeandAskanaRemastered, Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee), Fantasy, podiobook, audio book

item.title: Episode 2 - Chapter One: Meeting of the Minds - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: The First Queen of Morevi, Askana Moldarin, holds a private audience with Captain Rafe Rafton. A known enemy to the people of her realm, the privateer is now being offered a commission that is just too tantalizing to refuse...
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: The First Queen of Morevi, Askana Moldarin, holds...
item.itunes:summary: The First Queen of Morevi, Askana Moldarin, holds a private audience with Captain Rafe Rafton. A known enemy to the people of her realm, the privateer is now being offered a commission that is just too tantalizing to refuse...
item.itunes:keywords: MOREVITheChroniclesofRafeandAskanaRemastered, Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee), Fantasy, podiobook, audio book

item.title: Episode 3 - Chapter Two: Escape from Morevi (Part 1) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Askana Moldarin, during her morning training session with Blademaster Kubi-Sogi, is given a sampling of Captain Rafe Rafton's resourcefulness. The privateer's first display is a slight against Askana's religion while the next sets the Queen's counter-intrigue into motion...
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: Askana Moldarin, during her morning training session with...

item.itunes:keywords: MOREVITheChroniclesofRafeandAskanaRemastered, Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee), Fantasy, podiobook, audio book

item.title: Episode 4 - Chapter Two: Escape from Morevi (Part 2) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Setting the scene of a royal assassination, Rafe, Askana, and a band of privateers and Royal Guard plan a daring escape out of the Palace of a Thousand Suns and Morevi's capital city of Songkusai.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: Setting the scene of a royal assassination, Rafe,...

item.itunes:keywords: MOREVITheChroniclesofRafeandAskanaRemastered, Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee), Fantasy, podiobook, audio book

item.title: Episode 5 - Chapter Two: Escape from Morevi (Part 3) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Rafe, Askana, and their party make their way through the Sleeping Dragons to the neighboring nation of Eyrie, the conspirators growing more aggressive with each of their hastened steps.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)

item.title: Episode 6 - Chapter Three: The Great Game (Part One of Two) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: As Rafe & Askana make their way to Eyrie, Lady Dirare of House Jarahd considers the mystery of the dead assassin in the Queen's Chambers. She begins to devise a counter-strategy against this coup, focusing her attentions on Askana's consort.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: As Rafe & Askana make their way to...

item.title: Episode 7 - Chapter Three: The Great Game (Part Two of Two) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Askana's consort, Jermal, expects to find himself sheltered in the Queen's Country Estate. Instead, Jermal winds up in the last place he would ever wish to be.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)

item.title: Episode 8 - Chapter Four: Enlightenment (Part One of Three) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Rafe, Askana, Nassir, and Elunear reach Taighar, Eyrie's port city. They are to meet O'Donnell and Jailene at Sanctuary from the Sea and, with four crates of Morevian tea, arrange a meeting with The Merchants' Circle.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)

item.title: Episode 9 - Chapter Four: Enlightenment (Part Two of Three) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Inside a tinker's workshop in Taighar, Eyrie's port city, The Merchants' Circle meet with privateer captain Rafe Rafton. Askana watches from behind her disguise as the pirate begins weaving an intrigue of potential civil war and conspiracies against the Morevian Throne.
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)

item.description: -In this episode: Slipping away from the Defiant, Askana turns to the Caillech of the Tangled Southern Wood for a cure to the Kir'Shia poison.

item.title: Episode 15 - Chapter Seven: Merely the Beginning (Part One of Two) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Rafe and Askana have crossed The Rift and are now in the waters claimed by King Henry VIII. They also discover a stowaway in their midst. Meanwhile, back in Morevi, Kubi-Sogi continues to try and find out more about the queen's escape, taking his queries to the Dowager Queen, an old woman lost in madness...
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)

item.title: Episode 16 - Chapter Seven: Merely the Beginning (Part Two of Two) - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Min-Lu continues to plot against her one-time mentor, Askana Moldarin, remaining blissfully unaware of how her Eyriener connection is manipulating the conspiracy to meet his own needs. Deep in the Southern Wood, Kubi-Sogi arrives at the door of Grainne, in search of answers from a mad woman's ranting...

item.title: Chapter Fifteen: Nightmares and Negotiations - MOREVI: The Chronicles of Rafe and Askana (Remastered)
item.description: -In this episode: Allies arrive in secret to Songkusai at the same time reality arrives to His Majesty King Jermal. It is the High Lady Dirare that reminds the Consort-King where power in Morevi resides. Meanwhile, Askana - prisoner of Coumiran's Eyriener Forces - draws closer to Morevi. The closer she comes to home, the more she is plagued by bizarre dreams...
item.author: editor@podiobooks.com (Evo Terra)
item.itunes:author: Tee Morris (with Lisa Lee)
item.itunes:subtitle: Allies arrive in secret to Songkusai at the...
